entry.title: How to Use Facebook When it is Blocked
entry.summary:
Use Facebook Anywhere in just three Steps

To use Facebook anywhere you just need to trick your computer into thinking that you aren't using Facebook. This is very easy by means of a VPN and takes just a minute or two to setup.

Step 1: Sign up for a VPN Account

I recommend using the VPN provider Hide My Ass, Inc This is the same software that people use all over the world to get around office web filters, sporting event blackouts and internet censorship (the Chinese government being the most notorious). I used this method recently to watch Netflix when I was traveling the world for a year, to watch the 2012 Olympics on BBC and to use Facebook while I was in Vietnam.

You want to signup for Pro VPN from HMA It will cost you $10 for the first month, but you can choose to try one month and then renew at any time and also you can pay with Paypal so it will only take a few seconds if you are lazy like me and don't want to enter in your Credit Card information. This same method will let you use Twitter, Facebook, Hulu, YouTube or just about any other site that is blocked.

Step 2: Download the VPN Software

After you sign up, you will get a confirmation email and you will be able to login to your user account Here you have the option to download the Mac, Windows or Linux package you want to use.

Step 3: Connect to the VPN

After Downloading and Installing the Software, launch the application on your computer, enter in your username and password, and select 'USA - Virginia' or any other location from the drop down list of countries. Then click Connect to VPN and your computer traffic is now passing through there. Congratulations you can now use Facebook from anywhere.

Leave a comment below letting us know where you were able to use Facebook from!
